mapper.select: SELECT mno, mtitle, mposter, mrate, num FROM (SELECT mno, mtitle, mposter, mrate, rownum as num FROM (SELECT mno, mtitle, mposter, mrate FROM movie WHERE mrate IS NOT null ORDER BY mrate DESC)) WHERE rownum<=10

SELECT mno, mtitle, mposter, TO_CHAR(mrdate,'YYYY.MM.DD'), mstate, mgrade, mtype, num FROM(SELECT mno, mtitle, mposter, mrdate, mstate, mgrade, mtype, rownum as num FROM (SELECT mno, mtitle, mposter, mrdate, mstate, mgrade, mtype FROM movie WHERE mtype LIKE '1' ORDER BY mstate ASC, mno DESC))

SELECT mno, mtitle, mposter, TO_CHAR(mrdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), mstate, mgrade, mtype, num FROM(SELECT mno, mtitle, mposter, mrdate, mstate, mgrade, mtype, rownum as num FROM (SELECT mno, mtitle, mposter, mrdate, mstate, mgrade, mtype FROM movie WHERE mtype LIKE '2' ORDER BY mstate ASC, mno DESC))
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/20.0) FROM movie WHERE mtype LIKE '1'
